serviceDes: The sites that are created are made fully responsive so that they can be seen on all devices. This makes the UI of the site visitors better
Creating an API-based site that means only Frontend Development is also done by using Html, CSS, JS, React, and other libraries and frameworks that are required

A complete website is also be done with powerful unctionalities by using Html, CSS, JS, React, MongoDB, and Express, with some lightweight and popular frameworks and libraries, according to the requirment
